FénixEDU

Supporting academic processes

Follow me onGitHub

Domain Model

The FénixEDU module comprehends a domain model that supports all the academic processes for higher education institutions. FénixEDU implements such academic processes in a consistent manner in order to provide more transparency in the information flow.
